Title: Le bon Dieu sans confession
Writer: Paul Vialar (novel), Claude Autant-Lara, Ghislaine Autant-Lara, Roland Laudenbach
Actors: Danielle Darrieux, Henri Vilbert, Claude Laydu, Ivan Desny
Plot: Based on the novel by Paul Vialar. Stuck in a loveless marriage, bourgeois industrialist Francois falls in love with Janine, another man's wife.
